/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/glad.c.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/IndexBuffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/VertexBuffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/project.dir/src/VertexArray.cpp.o  -o project   -L"/home/max/Documents/semester_5/семестр5/CG/CG_Lab2(GLFW)/project/lib"  -Wl,-rpath,"/home/max/Documents/semester_5/семестр5/CG/CG_Lab2(GLFW)/project/lib" -lglfw3 -lGL -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXi -ldl
